tooltip.epicmoonmod.tstip: Y'all don't go on huntin' tigers without preparin' yerselves to get chomped 'tween one of them jaws!
skill.epicmoonmod.ts.tooltip2: In addition to firing bullets to slash the enemy more strongly and quickly,you can make a special attack and activate Tiantui Star[天退星] and Shin[心] by using the light obtained according to the number of times you slash the enemy
advancement.epicmoon.tentai_seitou.title: The roar like a winged tiger
